Text: Spare some change? Spare some cash please.

Speaker: Jess
Text: What are you doing out here?

Speaker: You
Text: Well… after we failed to turn things around at ITS4| I haven't been able to find a new job…

Speaker: You
Text: So since then I've been trying to get back on my feet but its been difficult.

Speaker: You
Text: I made too many poor choices and its led to this.

Speaker: Jess
Text: Well| I havent been doing too well either| I'm actually on my way to a job interview so I gotta run.

Speaker: You
Text: Good luck with that! But uh| before you go| do you think you could spare some lunch money?
